DataElement.preferredName: Current Clinical Hematologic Method Disease or Disorder Status Assessment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a current clinical / hematologic method was used to assess the disease status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Current Clinical Hematologic Method Disease or Disorder Status Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._The act of judging the value, significance, or extent of something.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Or Not Done Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question._The non-affirmative response to a question._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was a current clinical / hema
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a current clinical / hematologic assessment used to assess the disease status?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2897786
ReferenceDocuments.description: [IF EXISTS THEN "true" ELSE "false"] PerformedObservation.methodCode = "hematologic" WHERE  PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "assess disease status"
